mapper.select: SELECT `number`,`category`,`name`,`author`,`status`,`img`,`synopsis`,`data` FROM book WHERE ${hits} > (SELECT ${hits} FROM book ORDER BY ${hits} DESC LIMIT 1000, 1) ORDER BY ${hits} DESC LIMIT 0,100

SELECT `id`,`number`,`category`,`name`,`author`,`status`,`collection`,`wordNumber`,`data`,`totalHits`,`monthlyClicks`,`weeklyClicks`,`totalRecommendedNumber`,`monthlyRecommendedNumber`,`weekRecommendedNumber`,`img`,`synopsis` FROM book ORDER BY totalHits DESC

SELECT `id`,`number`,`category`,`name`,`author`,`status`,`collection`,`wordNumber`,`data`,`totalHits`,`monthlyClicks`,`weeklyClicks`,`totalRecommendedNumber`,`monthlyRecommendedNumber`,`weekRecommendedNumber`,`img`,`synopsis` FROM book WHERE author LIKE "%${author}%" OR `name` LIKE "%${name}%" OR `number` = "${name}" LIMIT ${page},${limit}

SELECT book.`id`,`number`,`category`,`name`,`author`,`status`,`collection`,`wordNumber`, `data`,newbookdate.`date`,`totalHits`,`monthlyClicks`,`weeklyClicks`, `totalRecommendedNumber`,`monthlyRecommendedNumber`, `weekRecommendedNumber`,`img`,`synopsis` FROM book JOIN newbookdate ON book.`number` = newbookdate.`id` ORDER BY newbookdate.`date` DESC
